subject: Sales
title: Default Bias: The Power of Opt-Out
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Default Bias: The Power of Opt-Out.

hook.text: Opt-out countries have organ donation rates near 99%. Opt-in countries hover around 15%.

buildup.text: People stick with the default option. Changing requires effort that most won't invest.

discovery.text: Default bias is powerful because inertia beats intention. The pre-selected choice almost always wins.

twist.text: Subscriptions exploit this. Free trials auto-convert because cancelling is the harder action.

climax.text: Design your offer's default wisely. Make the desired outcome the path of least resistance.

punchline.text: The easiest option almost always wins.

quiz.question: Why do opt-out organ donation countries have much higher rates?
options: The default is to donate, and most don't change it
